lines.text: She's lucky to have a mother like you.
Everyone has a mother like me. You probably had one, too.
You have your family, I have my Nagel.
You don't know how a family can surround you at times.
Do you never get away from your family?
Just once, David, I'd like to see you fully clothed.
When you're seventeen today, you know what the score is.
It was my way of doing something that made everything wrong!
